entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
